Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 67th/St.Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, St.Lawrence, Marquette, Cottage, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/St.Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, St.Lawrence, Marquette, Cottage, and 67th due to, street blockage near 67th/St.Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 63rd
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to police activity.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes #29 State or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
